## Acknowledgments

[R ncovr package](https://github.com/pzhaonet/ncovr) is used for data processing and visualization.

The data used on this site come from [BlankerL/DXY-2019-nCoV-Crawler](https://github.com/BlankerL/DXY-2019-nCoV-Crawler) and [JackieZheng/2019-nCoV](https://github.com/JackieZheng/2019-nCoV). The credit of the translation of area/city names from Chinese into English belongs to [brightgems/china_city_dataset](https://github.com/brightgems/china_city_dataset).

This site is built by [R blogdown package](https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/) with [HUGO](https://gohugo.io/), and updated automatically with [Travis-CI](https://travis-ci.org/).
